DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to evaluate H. pylori eradication rate in diabetic patients by using novel 10-day levofloxacin-based concomitant therapy compared with conventional 10-day sequential therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Levofloxacin-based Concomitant Therapy for H. Pylori Eradication in Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Diabetic patients with Helicobacter pylori infection Pregnancy or physically poor performance status Patients with contraindication for upper endoscopy Severe coagulopathy for endoscopic biopsy Chronic kidney disease (eGFR < 50) or end stage renal disease Known allergy to interventional drugs Previous eradication failure
